SUPPLEMENTAL FILE			
Probe sets and Weights for Predictors			
			
probeset_id:	probe set ID for U133A		
weight:	weight for probe set expression for calculation of risk score		
ER:	"ER-subset for which predictor applies (erp: ER+, ern: ER-)"		
predictor:	"surv: resistance, early relapse; rcb01: pathologic response; rcb3: resistance, extensive residual disease "		
			
Note:	Scores for each predictor are calculated by muptiplying the log2-normalized and reference-scaled expression value of each probeset by the corresponding weight		
	and then summing up all the weighted expression values for the probe sets in each predictor.  The weights will not produce the correct numeric score with unscaled		
	expression levels.		
			
probeset_id	weight	ER	predictor
